title: 68- The Longest Week
description: In the final week of the  most recent term, the Supreme Court decided to limit one constitutional right (abortion) and expand another constitutional right (guns). But there were other cases decided that week, which were also important and marked this as one of the most historically significant terms in over 100 years. So what happened in those other cases and why are they so important?
author: roman@99pi.org (Elizabeth Joh)
content:encoded: In the final week of the  most recent term, the Supreme Court decided to limit one constitutional right (abortion) and expand another constitutional right (guns). But there were other cases decided that week, which were also important and marked this as one of the most historically significant terms in over 100 years. So what happened in those other cases and why are they so important?
itunes:title: 68- The Longest Week
itunes:author: Elizabeth Joh
itunes:summary: We go through the other Supreme Court decisions that were released the same week Roe was overturned.
itunes:subtitle: We go through the other Supreme Court decisions that were released the same week Roe was overturned.
itunes:keywords: bremerton, climate change, west virginia, bruen, kennedy, makin, school prayer, dobbs, carson
